scripts.build: yarn run generate-local && graph build subgraph.local.yaml
scripts.build-develop: yarn run generate-develop && graph build subgraph.amoy-develop.yaml
scripts.build-release: yarn run generate-release && graph build subgraph.amoy-release.yaml
scripts.build-staging: yarn run generate-staging && graph build subgraph.amoy-staging.yaml
scripts.build-polygon: yarn run generate-polygon && graph build subgraph.polygon.yaml
scripts.codegen: yarn run generate-local && graph codegen subgraph.local.yaml
scripts.codegen-develop: yarn run generate-develop && graph codegen subgraph.amoy-develop.yaml
scripts.codegen-release: yarn run generate-release && graph codegen subgraph.amoy-release.yaml
scripts.codegen-staging: yarn run generate-staging && graph codegen subgraph.amoy-staging.yaml
scripts.codegen-polygon: yarn run generate-polygon && graph codegen subgraph.polygon.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: yarn run codegen && graph deploy --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 startbahn/startrail-local subgraph.local.yaml -l `jq '.version' package.json`
scripts.deploy-local-release: yarn run generate-release && graph deploy --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 startbahn/startrail-amoy-release subgraph.local-release.yaml -l `jq '.version' package.json`
scripts.deploy-local-staging: yarn run generate-staging && graph deploy --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 startbahn/startrail-amoy-staging subgraph.local-staging.yaml -l `jq '.version' package.json`
scripts.deploy-local-develop: yarn run generate-develop && graph deploy --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 startbahn/startrail-amoy-develop subgraph.local-develop.yaml -l `jq '.version' package.json`
scripts.deploy-alchemy-develop: yarn run generate-develop && graph deploy --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy startrail-amoy-develop --deploy-key $SUBGRAPH_DEPLOY_KEY --version-label $VERSION_LABEL subgraph.amoy-develop.yaml
scripts.deploy-alchemy-release: yarn run generate-release && graph deploy --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy startrail-amoy-release --deploy-key $SUBGRAPH_DEPLOY_KEY --version-label $VERSION_LABEL subgraph.amoy-release.yaml
scripts.deploy-alchemy-staging: yarn run generate-staging && graph deploy --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy startrail-amoy-staging --deploy-key $SUBGRAPH_DEPLOY_KEY --version-label $VERSION_LABEL subgraph.amoy-staging.yaml
scripts.deploy-polygon: yarn run generate-polygon && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ startbahn/startrail-polygon --access-token "$TOKEN" subgraph.polygon.yaml
scripts.deploy-alchemy-polygon: yarn run generate-polygon && graph deploy --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy startrail-polygon --deploy-key $SUBGRAPH_DEPLOY_KEY --version-label $VERSION_LABEL subgraph.polygon.yaml
scripts.create-startrail-network: docker network inspect startrail >/dev/null 2>&1 || docker network create startrail
scripts.graph-up: yarn create-startrail-network && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up
scripts.graph-up-bg: yarn create-startrail-network && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d
